Name: Revoking a food vending license for certain violations.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to revoking a food vending license for certain violations.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Health
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Subsection f of section 17-317 of title 17 of the Administrative Code of the city of New York is hereby amended to read as follows:
f. Any person issued a food vendor license pursuant to this subchapter who commits three or more violations of the provisions of this subchapter and any rules promulgated thereunder within a two year period shall have his or her food vendor license revoked.  Provided however, any person issued a food vendor license pursuant to this subchapter who is found to have violated Section 89.25 of the Health Code of the City of New York two or more times within a twelve month period shall have his or her food vendor license revoked.  
	Â§2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.  





LS 1578
LCC 
12/1/10
